dmca.title: Copyrigt violation warning
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Moudrick M. Dadashov [mailto:md@e-net.lt] 
Sent: Wednesday, March 01, 2006 6:21 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyrigt violation warning

Hello,

I'm writing on behalf of a Lithuanian company that holds IPR to
www.vestuves.lt (www.weddings.lt) portal.

Our investigation shows that a web site named www.vestuvems.com tentatively
hosted by your company is violating our intellectual property rights. We
kindly ask you to warn the owner/operator of www.vestuvems.com site about
the violation.

We hope the illegal content will be immediately removed or the
owner/operator of the site will provide us with proof of his/her copyrights
to the web site's content.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,

M.D.
CEO
UAB "Skaitmeninio sertifikavimo centras"
Jogailos 8-16, 01116 Vilnius, LITHUANIA

phone: +370-700-22722
fax: +370-700-22715
cell: +370-699-26662

--
e-Net webmail system
